content.prompt: Which of the following most likely explains the land loss suffered by Native Australians as described in Source 1 ?

choices.label: The Anglican Church’s aggressive missionary efforts in Australia
Australia’s rapid industrialization in the late nineteenth and early twentieth centuries
Climate change and desertification caused by Native Australians’ farming methods
The growth of Australia’s White settler population as a result of migration from Europe

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
